answers.author: Stewart Fairburn
answers.text:
Contact Edgerton Kansas. Just opened a large BNSF intermodal facility. They may be able to help you.

answers.author: [Unknown]
answers.text:
Hi Steve,
Thank you for your three interesting questions. In addition to any responses you get here you can try asking these questions again as individual questions in groups relevant to the questions. Here are some resources on the Knowledge Network that will hopefully help you in answering your questions. 
1.  New Railroad Development
•   “The Future of Transportation is Arriving Now” discusses new railroad developments in different cities across the country. http://icma.org/en/BlogPost/551/The_Future_of_Transportation_is_Now_Arriving
2.  Fire Access/Water Supply Access  
•   “What Works: Management Applications of Performance Measurement in Local Government” is a document created by ICMA that has case studies and best practices about code enforcement. icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/6192 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Steve Seddig
text:
1.)Has anyone experienced the new development of a railroad intermodal facility within their city limits? 
2.)What was your experience on enforcing local fire code ordinances for fire access/lanes? 
3.)What was your experience on enforcing local fire code ordinances for water supply/hydrants?
title: New Railroad Intermodal Facility & Enforcement of Local Fire Code Ordinances
